page.title: 18ROADS AND RAILS
page.content: We did a traffic count on the three main roads passing through the village.The busiest road is the one leading to the colliery where NCB lorries are passing all day long.People from the village complain that dirt from the lorries spoils their homes and their clean washing.The main Chesterfield road carries traffic to the area hospital so we see a lot of ambulances. RAILWAY /NATURE TRAIL There used to be a railway station in Arkwright.Trains took coal to the power station and passengers to the east coast.Some people in the village worked at the station.When the station was closed the land was made into a nature trail.Everyone likes this idea. They often go for walks there.We let our tadpoles go in the pond there.
